PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ChillerPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Chiller performance history attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: Capacity
PropertyDef.Definition: The product of the ideal capacity and the overall volumetric efficiency of the compressor.

PropertyDef.Name: CapacityCurve
PropertyDef.Definition: Chiller cooling capacity is a function of condensing temperature and evaporating temperature, data is in table form, Capacity = f (TempCon, TempEvp), capacity = a1+b1*Tei+c1*Tei^2+d1*Tci+e1*Tci^2+f1*Tei*Tci.

PropertyDef.Name: CoefficientOfPerformanceCurve
PropertyDef.Definition: Chiller coefficient of performance (COP) is function of condensing temperature and evaporating temperature, data is in table form, COP= f (TempCon, TempEvp), COP = a2+b2*Tei+c2*Tei^2+d2*Tci+e2*Tci^2+f2*Tei*Tci

PropertyDef.Name: FullLoadRatioCurve
PropertyDef.Definition: Ratio of actual power to full load power as a quadratic function of part load, at certain condensing and evaporating temperature, FracFullLoadPower = f ( PartLoadRatio).
